changeSet.author: baskaran radhakrishnan
changeSet.sql: insert into tbl_key_refer (KEYWORD1,KEYWORD2,KEYWORD3,KEYWORD4,KEYWORD5,KEYWORD6,DYNAWORD1,DYNAWORD2,TABLENAME,FIELDNAME,WHERETCOND,WHERECOND) values('EMPID','EMP ID','EMPLOYEE ID','EMPLOYEEID','','','','','TBL_EMPLOYEE','EMPLOYEE_ID','','')
